name: Wasteland Punk
description:
Welcome to Wasteland Punk – a mad future world! The Earth has never been so dangerous place! Become the commander of the mercenary squad in this post-apocalyptic open world RPG!

The old world ended in a devastating solar flare that destroyed most of the electricity generating units! Then the US Army AI in control of the nuclear armament went mad and launched hundreds of missiles all over the world!

Human civilization lies in ruins. The world became a dangerous place full of mutated animals, environmental disasters, and madness! But… this world has you! Time to step up, take the lead and start building a better life! Only you and your team can put the world madness under control!

Explore the wasteland, find new allies, gather resources, and craft new items! Conquer enemies from different factions and do your best to survive!

Create your of 4 -men squad and go on exploration tours in the wasteland. Visit various locations to upgrade yourself and your teammates! Visit local pub to recruit a new teammate or increase the team level! Craft new weapons in the workshop! Get in the car and drive through the desert to find and complete new missions!

Game features:
- Bright unique graphics!
- Huge open world map!
- Deep and balanced RPG system!
- Many characters’ classes!
- Sophisticated system of upgrades!
- Intriguing non-linear plot!
